ISSUE.TITLE: build status badge always show as "build|none" regardless what's the real status is
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I managed setup a drone service with master branch code(built from source) and the test project can build, however, I see the "status badge" of my test project always show "build|none" regardless what's the real status is, building, sucess or fail. Am I missed somthing? Thanks in advance!

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: [CODE-1573]: fix for breaking search page for org and account repositories (#1114)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: self as codeowner can be skipped (#1124)
